janus.qm_wrapper.QMWrapper¶

class janus.qm_wrapper.QMWrapper(param, program)¶
__init__(param, program)¶

QM wrapper super class

Parameters:
  • param (dict) – parameters for QM computations
  • program (str) – what program to use for QM computations
